long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon Influencer - Find products to review in seconds!

Maximize your earnings potential as an Amazon Influencer with this easy-to-use tool.
It shows you useful data about products on Amazon.com.

GET:
- Product sales
- Onsite Commission $
- Onsite Commission %
- Overall Score [NEW]
- And more!
* The data boxes might take a few moments to load, as there are many operations going on in the background to give these results. Thank you for your patience.

HOW TO USE
1. Go to an Amazon.com search page or product page.
2. Wait a few moments.
3.a In the a search results page, product data should show below product frames.
3.b In a product page, product data should show above the product title, at the top of the page.
